RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 20 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AMES MISTER slow early advanced wide to upper stretch getting up late four deep. CANT GLIDE BY KATZ went evenly through the turn losing ground to upper stretch grabbing a late lead missing to outside pressure at the wire. SO COURAGEOUS pressed a narrow lead into upper stretch digging in along the inside ceding late to wide rivals. KAPHAVATA pressed the pace dueling into upper stretch being outbid by wide foes late. BORN FOR VICTORY chased close up through the turn then raced evenly down the lane. KAZTHAROS gave hard pursuit through the turn weakening in upper stretch. RADCLIFFE slow early swung out eight wide into upper stretch. SMUDGE THE CAT raced evenly in mid pack fading in upper stretch. GENIUS flashed early speed then gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Genius
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed speed, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Radcliffe
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, taken wide

ENTRY.NAME: Cant Glide by Katz
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lost ground to lane, surged mid track, led late, missed

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Born for Victory
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased close up through the turn, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Smudge the Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Ames Mister
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, advanced wide to lane, rallied up late four deep

ENTRY.NAME: So Courageous
ENTRY.OWNER: Diamond Oak Stable and Splurgin Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dug in upper stretch, ceded to wide foes

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Kaztharos
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, pursued through turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Kaphavata
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled into lane, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 5F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 20, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEFEND set the pace coming under pressure on the turn digging deep in upper stretch finding more to clear late. MATERS N TATERS raced evenly through the turn moving five wide down the late rallying late to salvage place. AW ITE pressed on the turn bearing down all out abreast rival in upper stretch weakening late. MY MAE DAY raced evenly moving along the inside down the lane lacking surge. MONOLITO saved ground bidding from the rail in upper stretch fading late. CATES SWOOSH slow early played no factor. UNION BROTHER was never involved. GIANT TRICK was always outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BAYTOWN BEAVER sent clear set the pace digging in to upper stretch holding daylight while weary late. ELEGGUA stalked the pace chasing to upper stretch vying weary to wire. SENSE OF GOLDEN slow early advanced with even action to upper stretch bidding five wide late. NORTHERN RUNNER gained on the far turn then weakened along the inside down the lane. TRUST FUND ROBBER was never involved. GALLAZO tracked early then faded on the far turn. PAINTSVILLE gave early retreat.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 20 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIMI'S HOLIDAY off slowly rallied on the turn vying from mid track down the lane surging late four deep to get up on the wire. DONNA LIRICA in tight at the break pressed the pace dueling through the turn extending along the inside down the lane missing in a game effort. KAIYAS SONG chased the pace looming into upper stretch surging late between horses to be right there on the wire. BEA BEA KAZ pressed the pace dueling through the turn battling from the rail down the lane staying on to the end. FOREST ACCLAMATION veered in sharply checking at the break, chased the pace then tired in upper stretch. ZIPPITY DAY in close at the break would fade on the turn. ARTISTIC ALIBI folded up on the turn. DON'T LOOK UP pressed early then gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, gave way

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled through the turn, dug in rail, stayed on

ENTRY.COMMENT: in close break, faded turn

ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight break, pressed pace, dueled inside lane, just missed,

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased the pace, loomed lane, surged between horses late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 68. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 23800. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 20, 2022 OR CLAIMING $6,500. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 20 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JAMESTOWN ROAD pressed to put a head in front on the turn shaking clear near mid track in upper stretch widening under a drive. CHURCH KEY pressed to draw even abreast rival on the turn losing ground to upper stretch ceding there securing place in the six path. ULTRA DIVA chased on the turn bidding from the inside in upper stretch weakening late. SMOKIN LADY chased early then wavered on the turn fading to upper stretch. VACATION SECRET sent to an early lead was passed on the turn giving way to upper stretch. PAINTED ROCKET dropped well back early.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 103. Allowance Purse 28600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 20 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden, Claiming, Or Starter Races Not Considered) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022 - 2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KOSHER COWBOY away alertly set the pace digging in from the two path down the lane angling out four wide late managing to keep a nose down on the wire. LIBERATE chased racing inside to upper stretch surging to draw even in the closing yards just missing on the wire. BAYTOWN BEAR a step slow through the turn raced evenly down the lane to best the others. WILLISTON WAY close early would retreat on the turn. JUSTWAVEANDSMILE breaking slowly would trail throughout.

ENTRY.COMMENT: retreated on the turn

Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KINGSTON TIME rallied on the turn bidding mid track down the late surging up late three deep. HIDDEN IDENTITY chased on the turn bidding four wide down the lane surging late between horses. CLAIRE'S DARLING set the pace digging in to upper stretch faltering late under wide pressure. CAPTAIN ANNE tracked evenly to upper stretch weakening while holding spot late. CYBERBURG slow early played no factor. SMOOKIE was always outrun. BIRDIE BLUE gave way on the turn. SOUTHERNPERFECTION had brief speed then retreated on the turn.
